segments.pli: “Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti hoti.
segments.en: “There are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the gratification provided by these things, consciousness is conceived.
Consciousness is a condition for name and form. …
That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
Suppose there was a great tree.
And its roots going downwards and across all draw the sap upwards. …

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti hoti … pe ….
segments.en: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the gratification provided by these things, consciousness is conceived. …

segments.pli: Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti na hoti.
segments.en: There are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the drawbacks of these things, consciousness is not conceived.
When consciousness ceases, name and form cease. …
That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
Suppose there was a great tree.

segments.pli: Atha puriso āgaccheyya kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya … pe …
segments.en: Then a person comes along with a spade and basket. …
In this way the great tree is cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.

segments.pli: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato viññāṇassa avakkanti na hoti.
segments.en: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the drawbacks of these things, consciousness is not conceived.
When consciousness ceases, name and form cease. …
That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.”

suttaplex.blurb: Consciousness is reborn when you linger on pleasing things that stimulate fetters, illustrated with the simile of a tree.
